name: Rocket League (itch)
description:
★ Project Details ★

This game is a recreation of the game, Rocket League.

★ Instructions ★

Use your car to hit the ball into the other teams goal on the left side.

Try to avoid having the AI hit the ball into your goal.

After 60 seconds, the highest point amount wins. 

★ Controls ★

Arrow keys or WASD to move your car around.

★ Credits ★

Rocket League for theme song, inspiration.

Google for images.
